text: innum, allah unkalukkaka unkalilirunte manaiviyarai erpatuttiyirukkiran; unkalukku unkal manaiviyariliruntu cantatikalaiyum; peran pettikalaiyum erpatutti, unkalukku nalla porutkaliliruntu akaramum alikkiran; appatiyiruntum, (tame karpanai ceytu konta) poyyanatin mitu iman kontu allahvin arutkotaiyai ivarkal nirakarikkirarkala
